attributes.action: We the people demand this and future cabinet members receive the minimum benefit for the length of a parlement
attributes.additional_details:
ALL Members of the cabinet should live on the benefit - benefits that relates to them and their families. This would be taken from their current government wage

The rest of their wage would be put in trust for the length of their parlement and paid in one lump sum.at the end

This would make cabinet members feel what it's like to live on bear essentials for years.

You have already rejected this petition saying there is one already.. There is NOT a petition asking for ALL cabinet ministers to live on ESA
